item.title: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three shares to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three shares to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025
bullets: Indian stock market: The Indian stock market closed flat on Friday, September 5, as profit booking persisted amid worries over Trump’s tariffs and their
The Sensex and Nifty 50 opened on a positive note but were unable to sustain gains despite favorable global cues and expectations of a
The Sensex edged down by 7 points to close at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 gained 7 points to settle at 24,741.
The BSE Midcap index dipped 0.10 per cent, whereas the Smallcap index rose slightly by 0.09 per cent.

item.title: Matarbari deep sea port in Bangladesh to boost trade, connectivity to eastern India as well, says official

review.headline_rewrite: Matarbari deep sea port in Bangladesh to boost trade, connectivity to eastern India as well, says official
bullets: Of this, 1,200 MW coal-based power plants have already started generating electricity.
The total GDP impact is projected at $150 billion.
Of that amount, the direct GDP impact will be $70-75 billion.
